## hpr1564 :: An Open Source News Break from Opensource.com

 
In this episode: The growing demand for Linux professionals, a new open access science journal, and the open sourced search for a malaria cure.


Links:


https://opensource.com/business/14/6/linux-professionals-jobs

https://opensource.com/life/14/5/leader-open-access-among-scientific-journals

https://opensource.com/life/14/6/international-team-open-sources-search-malaria-cure
